venue.address_1: Head of the Bay Road and Red Brook Road
venue.name: Lyman Reserve

item.description:
Join the Friends of Myles Standish State Forest at the Red Brook Family Day & Movie Night. We'll have a booth for the group and will be selling the native plants that we've propagated from pine barrens species. Everyone who stops in will get a packet of milkweed seeds to plant now for monarch butterflies next year.

Explore Red Brook with hands on activities during Red Brook Family Day.

Find out what local and regional environmental organizations are currently involved with at the environmental fair. At dusk settle in to watch “A Brook Through Time”, a story about the Lyman family's work to save this property for future generations. Bring a picnic, blanket and sit back and enjoy the fun.

Any questions call 774.302.0779. FREE- ALL ARE WELCOME!

This event is sponsored by Trustees of Reservations, Mass Wildlife, The Wareham Land Trust and Trout Unlimited.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Red Brook Family Day & Movie Night
